overview: Ms. Lorenzen has over 20 years of experience in all facets of strategic global marketing. Prior to GlobalEnglish, she was VP of Marketing for Autonomy following its acquisition of Interwoven, where she was VP of Corporate and International Marketing. Previously, Ms. Lorenzen held several senior marketing roles in both the U.S. and Singapore at Polycom, including VP of Corporate Marketing. Early in her career Ms. Lorenzen served nearly 8 years in Business Week’s strategic marketing group. Ms. Lorenzen received her BA in East Asian Studies from Middlebury College, and holds an MBA in International Strategy from New York University’s Stern School of Business and the Chinese University of Hong Kong.
